section.title: The Art of Fine Dining

cards.title: Culinary Excellence
cards.description: Experience culinary excellence with our carefully curated menu and premium ingredients.

cards.title: Michelin-Inspired Artistry
cards.description: Our master chefs bring decades of experience in crafting exceptional dishes.

cards.title: Orchestrated Perfection
cards.description: Every dish is prepared and served at the perfect moment for optimal taste.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.description: Since 1947, Maison has been more than a restaurant; it's been a journey of passion, tradition, and culinary excellence passed down through three generations.

values.title: Culinary Excellence
values.description: Every dish is crafted with precision, passion, and the finest ingredients, honoring traditional techniques while embracing modern innovation.

values.title: Family Heritage
values.description: Three generations of culinary expertise have shaped our restaurant, passing down secret recipes and techniques that make each dish unique.

values.title: Community
values.description: We believe in creating more than meals; we create memories, bringing people together through the universal language of exceptional food.

header.title: Culinary Insights
header.description: Discover the techniques, stories, and passion behind our signature dishes

posts.title: The Art of Wagyu
posts.subtitle: Mastering the perfect sear and temperature
posts.content: Our master chef demonstrates the intricate process of preparing the perfect Wagyu steak. The key lies in bringing the meat to room temperature, seasoning it properly, and achieving the perfect sear while maintaining a medium-rare center.

posts.title: Perfect Truffle Risotto
posts.subtitle: A symphony of flavors and textures
posts.content: Learn the secrets behind our award-winning truffle risotto. From selecting the finest Carnaroli rice to the precise timing of adding the black truffle, every step is crucial in creating this signature dish.
